entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 5:52 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain at times heavy late this evening and ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then south 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
